text: Hagi ana hu'negu Nagri eri'za vahe Jekopu naga'mota antahintahi hakarea nosuta, Israeli vahe'mota korora osiho. Na'ankure Nagra Ra Anumzamo'na ru moparegama mani'naregatira, ete tamavre'na ne-ena, ne'mofa'ma ru kuma tamimpima kinama ome hu'naregatira ete zamavare'na egahue. Ana hanugeta Jekopu nagamota mopatamia ete eme erita akoheta mani fruhuta manisageno, mago vahemo'e huno tamazeri korora osugahie, huno Ra Anumzamo'a hu'ne.
